page.title: 14TRAFFIC SURVEYS
page.content:
{ Because the buses don't run very often and people either walk to Buxton or use cars we decided to do a traffic survey of Harpur Hill Road & the A515.
On the A515 between noon & 1pm more vehicles (62) went to Buxton than towards Ashbourne (43), possibly it was market day-Wednesday-in Buxton. The road did not seem very busy but there were quite a few lorries, especially quarry trucks. 3 cars turned down Staden Lane to Cowdale and 2 turned off towards Harpur Hill. In the morning Harpur Hill Rd was most busy between 8.50-9.00am. with people going to school or college. Traffic was 75% lighter 10 minutes later. 144 vehicles went up to Harpur Hill and 112 came down between 8.40 & 9.00am. There were 25 pedestrians
